Sentence.string: I’ve been told that your husband’s guilty pleasure was ladies.
Did your husband had extramarital relations ?
No… I’ve never heard such a thing.
This is quite surprising. I have a trusty source that told me he used to go to the Grey Cat.
Well done, you got me ! What a great detective you are. I’m surprised that they entrusted you this simple case.
I think that the situation is much more complex than you think. There are too many people hiding things from me in this case to believe this suicide hypothesis. Now, answer my question please.
Your wish is my command. Marcus and I loved each other. At least at the beginning. I rapidly realized that he was concerned by other ladies.
Well, I think I expected it and finally accepted it. I must say I didn’t deprived myself on my side.

This is a very good question I asked myself many times. At the beginning, I stayed for the children. Then, when they grew up, I think I was used to it and it became our way of life. Moreover, Marcus let me take advantage of his fortune.
